titleStmt.title: A treatise shewing the subordination of the will of man unto the will of God by that eminently godly, able, and faithfull minister of Christ, William Strong, lately of the Abbey at Westminster ; the greatest part printed with his own marginal quotations in his life time, and now published by Mr. Rowe, Master Manton, and Master Griffith.
titleStmt.author: Strong, William, d. 1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton ...,

notesStmt.note: The epistle signed: John Rowe, Tho. Manton, George Griffith.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
